email.showMessage: boolean // toggles which right panel to show

rightPanel../email-message.html: string // Location of the message html
rightPanel../compose.html: string // Location of the compose html

email.activeCategory: string // stores the category for mail type
email.autofill: boolean // toggles auto fill of compose.html

activeEmails.email.json: object // holds information for a given email

email.activeEmail: object //holds information about a given email from active emails
